Definition.WordDefinition: Edinburgh, IN (town, FIPS 20404) Location: 39.35268 N, 85.96747 W Population (1990): 4536 (1801 housing units) Area: 4.8 sq km (land), 0.0 sq km (water) Zip code(s): 46124
